text: Miriam Greatest Hits () is Cantopop artist Miriam Yeung's () seventh Compilation album. It was released by Go East on 4 December 2009. The package includes 3 CDs that includes forty-one Miriam's greatest hits from 1996 to 2006. Yeasia – Miriam Greatest Hits album info. Retrieved 4 April 2011 The package also include a DVD with twelve music videos. ==Track listing== ===CD1=== # 狼來了 (Wolf Is Coming) # 再見二丁目 (Goodbye Nichō) # 直覺 (Instinct) # 友誼萬歲 (Friendship Forever) # 手信 (Souvenir) # 數你 (Counting You) # 大激想 (Wild Dream) # 因為所以（畢氏定理） (Because & Therefore – Pythagorean Theorem) # 愛人 (Lover) # 抬起我的頭來 (Raise My Head) # 夏天的故事 (Summer Story) # 冰點 (Freezing Point) # 木偶奇遇記 (The Adventures of Pinocchio) # 最後的歌 (Last Song) # 少女的祈禱 (Maiden's Prayer) # 如果東京不快樂 (If Tokyo is Not Happy) # 可人兒 (Cutie) ===CD2=== # 姊妹 (Sister) # 野孩子 (Wild Child) # 悲歌之王 (King of Sad Songs) # 假如讓我說下去 (If You Let Me Continue) # 河童 (River Creature) # 楊千嬅 (Yeung Chin Wah – Remix) # 閃靈 (The Shining) # 勇 (Courage) # 向左走向右走 (Turn Left, Turn Right) # 小飛俠 (Peter Pan) # 可惜我是水瓶座 (Sadly I am an Aquarius) # 笑中有淚 (Hidden Tear in Smiles) # 我是羊 (I am a Sheep) # 飛女正傳 (Story of a Bad Girl) # 稀客 (Rare Visitor) # 咬唇 (Biting Lips) # 寒舍 (Cold Accommodation) ===CD3=== # 小星星 (Little Stars) # 自由行 (Individual Visit) # 小城大事 (Small City Big Matter) # 處處吻 (Kissing Everywhere) # 煉金術 (Alchemy) # 烈女 (Fierce Lady) # 簡愛 (Simple Love) # 長信不如短訊(長痛不如短痛) (Short Message Is Better Than Long Letter – Immediate Relief Mix) # 花與愛麗斯 (Hana and Alice) # 超齡 (Over- age) # 火紅火熱–楊千嬅/ 梁漢文/ 鄭中基/ 何韻詩 (Red & Hot Fire) # 我的醉愛 (Love Drunk) # 大傻 (Naive) # 我的生存之道 (The Way I Live My Life) # 芬梨道上 (On Findlay Road) # 郎來了(ROSE) (Groom Is Coming – ROSE) # 滾 – 楊千嬅/梁漢文 (Get Off) ==DVD== # 再見二丁目 (Goodbye Nichō) # 愛人 (Lover) # 抬起我的頭來 (Raise My Head) # 如果東京不快樂 (If Tokyo Is Not Happy) # 姊妹 (Sister) # 野孩子 (Wild Child) # 閃靈 (The Shining) # 可惜我是水瓶座 (Sadly I am an Aquarius) # 煉金術 (Alchemy) # 小城大事 (Small City Big Matter) # 郎來了 (Wolf Is Coming) # 長信不如短訊 (Short Message Is Better Than Long Letters) ==References== Category:2009 albums Category:Miriam Yeung albums
